SVGraphics

Class SVEllipse

  • java.lang.Object
    • SVGraphics.SVGraphics
      • SVGraphics.SVEllipse

  • public class SVEllipse
extends SVGraphics
    SVEllipse class extends SVDefault and represents ellipse element

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SVEllipse()
      no-arg constructor calls super with ellipse tag name
      SVEllipse(java.awt.Point location)
      one-arg constructor calls super with ellipse tag name and location
      SVEllipse(java.awt.Point location, int width, int height)
      two-arg constructor calls super with ellipse tag name, location, and width and height int values
